segments.text: How long do you plan to stay here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To speak frankly , it doesn't depend on me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really want to obtain a permanent job . I won't leave as long as I have opportunity to apply my knowledge and get on well with my superiors and colleagues .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are your future plans and what kind of expectations do you have of the company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know that generally it is possible to move from this position to a management position with two years experience in the company
segments.speaker: S2
